thread.section_title: CurrencyFair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CurrencyFair | currencyfair.com
thread.title: Lewis

author: Lewis
title: Lewis
text:
What a change to doing it yourself or at least with the help of a friend who has used the service before!
After setting up the account and getting all the international banking details finalised it was just a matter of working out how much money was needed to be converted from my currency with the preferred rate identified.
In went the currency deal and off to bed I went The following morning all the transactions were done and then the transfer overseas was completed and confirmation was received by the waiting agents was received within 48 hours.
Then the best news - the amount I transferred was the exact amount that my agents received. No fees were extracted!! I think I saved approximately 100 dollars all up from this process as compared to using my bank which I have previously used to do a similar transaction.
I plan to use Currencyfair.again when needed.
